item.title: The signature of human pressure history on the biogeography of body mass in tetrapods
item.description: Related materials We find that the effect of human pressure history on body mass distribution differs among tetrapod taxa @GEB_macro https://t.co/tI4mJ0Un9r pic.twitter.com/tF1sfEeVeR — 𝐆𝐈𝐎 𝐑𝐀𝐏𝐀𝐂𝐂𝐈𝐔𝐎𝐋𝐎 (@giorapac) July 3, 2017
